hanzi-su-wiki:
殴

Значения

Бить, колотить

Мнемоника

Участки 区 тела, где остались следы ударов 殳. Ссадины, побои.

Варианты

毆
purpleculture_pinyin:
ōu
to beat up; to hit sb
бить; ударить кого-то
rtega_mnemonic:
毆毆RS
殴殴		beat, fight with fists, hit
  • area in the city 區/区 where on fights with weapons 殳
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 毆)
Pictophonetic: 区 indicates the sound; 殳 (weapon) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
殴打 [ ōu dǎ ]: to beat up; to come to blows; battery (law)
斗殴 [ dòu ōu ]: to fight; to brawl; a scuffle; a punch-up
殴斗 [ ōu dòu ]: to have a fist fight; fist fight; brawl
殴打罪 [ ōu dǎ zuì ]: assault and battery (law)
围殴 [ wéi ōu ]: to gang up and beat
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 区 [ qū ] area, district, region, ward; surname
    • 殳 [ shū ] tool, weapon
heisig_chinese_memo: The city decides to disperse the homeless region with a precision missile hit. They didn't know Wolverine was living in a cardboard box there though...
heisig_constituent: assault, ward, box, sheaf, missile, cruise missile, wind, crotch
koohiiStory1: The biggest assault on Japan during WW2 is when the wards in Hiroshima and Nagasaki were wiped out by nuclear missiles.
koohiiStory2: In this hospital ward, the personnel is assaulted by missiles. Think of a ward where crazy old people assault the personnel because they don´t like the food, they don´t want to take their medicines, they want to go home, etc. The patients use whatever they can get their hands on as missiles.
jp_example_words: 殴る(なぐる): to strike, to hit
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: Give a district weapons and it will assault other districts.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture two districts using weapons to assault each other from above. Like in a video game, with little arrows showing you where they're launching each assault.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This assault is all the 王's (おう) fault. The 王 gave the weapons to each of the districts on purpose so this would happen.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture the districts assaulting each other from above again, and then pan out and see the 王 standing above, watching it all happen. He's cackling.
Ru_Radicals: 丶 (капля), ノ, 几 (стол), 匚 (коробка на боку), 又 (опять), 殳 (удар)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you're in the lance shaft's (殳) ward (区) you could get assaulted
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The city decides to disperse the homeless region with a precision missile hit. They didn't know Wolverine was living in a cardboard box there though...

殴字的基本解释

殴
（毆）
ōu
打人：殴打。殴伤。斗殴。互殴。

殴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ōu］
［《廣韻》烏后切，上厚，影。］
亦作“摳2”。“敺2”的被通假字。“殴1”的繁体字。
击打。
[②]［kōu］
［《集韻》墟侯切，平侯，溪。］
“殴2”的繁体字。
见“毆2蛇”。
[③]［qū］
［《集韻》虧于切，平虞，溪。］
“殴3”的繁体字。“驅1”的古字。
驱赶；驱使。
[④]［ǒu］
［《廣韻》烏后切，上厚，影。］
“殴4”的繁体字。
呕，呕吐。参见“毆4血”。
[⑤]［òu］
“殴5”的繁体字。
用同“慪”。参见“毆5氣”。

殴字的康熙字典解释

【辰集下】【殳字部】　毆； 康熙笔画：15； 页码：页584第21
【唐韻】烏后切【集韻】於口切，?音嘔。【說文】捶毄物也。【徐曰】以杖擊也。　又【集韻】墟?切，音摳。【公羊傳·桓十二年】盟于毆蛇。【註】毆，丘于反，又曲侯反。蛇音移，又音池。　又【集韻】虧于切，音區。與驅、敺音義?同。【韻會】毛氏曰：毆擊字本从殳，或作攴。攴，敲也。今書作文，與歐吐字不同，歐字从欠伸之欠，今俗毆擊字作?，非。

殴字的源字形

殴字的起名意思

古代兵器，用以撞击。本义：打击，捶击。

Name meaning

殴
形声字。女表意,古文字形体像手持杖击打;區(区ou)表声,区是古代藏物的容器,表示殴是用杖击物。声旁简化。本义
是用杖击打。泛指击打。

Пиктофонетические символы.
Женская идеограмма, древние иероглифы подобны удару палкой; район (qu ou) выражает звук, а район - вместилище древних владений, что означает, что избиение - это удар палкой.
Голосовое упрощение.

В основном относится к ударам.

Radicals: 区, 殳  (district, weapon)
Meaning Mnemonic
Give a district weapons and it will assault other districts.
Picture two districts using weapons to assault each other from above. Like in a video game, with little arrows showing you where they're launching each assault.
Reading Mnemonic
This assault is all the 王's (おう) fault. The 王 gave the weapons to each of the districts on purpose so this would happen.
Picture the districts assaulting each other from above again, and then pan out and see the 王 standing above, watching it all happen. He's cackling.
